title: The.Mysterious.Cities.of.Gold.Secret.Paths.MULTi10-PROPHET
description:
The.Mysterious.Cities.of.Gold.Secret.Paths.MULTi10-PROPHET

 


 korma proudly announces



 The Mysterious Cities of Gold - Secret Paths
 (c) Neko Entertainment

 release date:  Nov 21, 2013
 protection: Steam
 # of discs: 1
 languages: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/PT/NO/SE/AR

 Play Esteban, Zia and Tao through numerous tricky
 levels full of puzzles, traps and infiltration
 phases in a wide variety of diverse gorgeous
 settings. Explore every nook and cranny of China
 and escape Zares' hostile men, searching for the
 local City of Gold. Faithful to the story-line and
 art style of the famous Mysterious Cities of Gold
 anime cartoon, Secret Paths lets you dig deep in
 this wonderful cross-media universe. You get to
 play with all the main characters, and each hero
 has his own set of qualities that you will need to
 use smartly when approaching the different
 challenges. Pick between them wisely - Their
 personality matters!

 1- Unpack, burn or mount
 2- Install the game
 3- Copy the crack from PROPHET dir
 4- Go To Hell!

 NOTE:
 Language can be selected in the in-game options
 menu
